issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Note: This is/might not be our issue but can be used for future reference

Description:
1.When you connect the Z10 device to the mac or win machine it automatically installs the blackberry link software which enables the machine to see the device(installs device driver).
2.As of now there is no blackberry software avaliable for linux on the blackberry website.
3.Check this link link : http://us.blackberry.com/software/desktop/blackberry-link.html?CPID=us:bb:desktop:jan2013:vanity:bb10:bblink

4.Because of this the features which only work on device such as media etc cannot be tested.
fields.summary: BlackBerry : Cant run apps on device in linux as no device driver avaliable for Z10 device
fields.environment:
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.0.201303191930
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.0.v20130319225749
Linux 12.04 LTS
Dev alpha B 10 device

comments.body: Closing this ticket as the issue is not our bug.
